1: Song of ascensions. They trusting in Jehovah are as mount Zion; it shall not be moved; remaining forever.
2: Jerusalem, the mountains are round about to her; and Jehovah is round about to his people from now and even to forever.
3: For the rod of the unjust one shall not rest upon the lot of the just; so that the just shall not stretch forth their hand in iniquity.
4: Do good, O Jehovah, to the good and to the upright in their hearts.
5: And those turning to their winding ways, Jehovah will cause them to go with those working iniquity: peace upon Israel.
